<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>populate sys_cs_context_profile_skill and update sys_cb_topic for customers that have no updated their store apps</description>
        <name>populate NAP skill to default profile</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var skillsToUpdate = [{
        // Generate resolution notes
        skillId: 'abe04b5f1b307110f9ddb888cc4bcbc7',
        cbTopicId: '88e4565b1b7c3110f9ddb888cc4bcbc2'
    },
    {
        // Record summarization
        skillId: '2fa9662a1bb83110f9ddb888cc4bcbab',
        cbTopicId: 'd06dda5e1bf83110f9ddb888cc4bcb16'
    },
    {
        // Chat Summarization
        skillId: 'f7c4b076a3303110f066d78446fcda4c',
        cbTopicId: 'fa72413980347110f877ff0b7632bedd'
    },
    {
        // KB
        skillId: '29d56452183c3110f877446ed5e48964',
        cbTopicId: '867c8129b9307110f8771616c12e1480'
    }
];
var defaultNAPContextProfileId = 'e93cab98c7c03110b65579a988c260c4';

for (i in skillsToUpdate) {
    var profileSkillGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_context_profile_skill');
    profileSkillGr.initialize();
    profileSkillGr.setValue("context_profile", defaultNAPContextProfileId);
    profileSkillGr.setValue("skill_id", skillsToUpdate[i].skillId);
    profileSkillGr.insert(); // duplicates will be blocked by BR

    var cbTopicGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cb_topic');
    if (cbTopicGr.get(skillsToUpdate[i].cbTopicId) && cbTopicGr.getValue("context_profiles") == null) {
        cbTopicGr.setValue("context_profiles", defaultNAPContextProfileId);
        cbTopicGr.autoSysFields(false);
        cbTopicGr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
